typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> oltpsrc
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> olaptgt
oltpsrc derive(DWHash = sha2(256, age+phone)) ~> createHash
createHash, olaptgt exists(createHash@DWHash == olaptgt@DWHash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> existsInOlap
existsInOlap, olaptgt lookup(oltpsrc@id == olaptgt@id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lkpOlap
lkpOlap derive(Inserted = iif(isNull({_Inserted}),currentTimestamp(),{_Inserted}),
		Updated = iif(isNull({_LastUpdated}),currentTimestamp(),{_LastUpdated})) ~> addAuditColumns
addAuditColumns alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['sink1@id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id = oltpsrc@id,
		name = oltpsrc@name,
		age = oltpsrc@age,
		address = oltpsrc@address,
		phone = oltpsrc@phone,
		{_Inserted},
		{_LastUpdated},
		DWHash = createHash@DWHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
